org.trianacode.discovery

Interface ToolMetadataResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ToolResolver

    public interface ToolMetadataResolver
    Resolver extension API. Resolvers will be asked to re-resolve periodically. They should therefore attempt to only return new or changed metadata on subsequent calls to resolve(). Add your resolver by putting a META-INF/services/org.trianacode.discovery.ToolMetadataResolver file in your jar or classpath containing the full name of your resolver.
